name: GardenParty-ArcadeGame
0:
”Alexa, launch Garden Party”
”Alexa, open Garden Party”
”Alexa, start Garden Party”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: garden party
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Garden Party ('Strange things happen behind your house') which is a fun Voice controlled Arcade style skill for screen based Alexa devices.

It is your job to guide 'Frank the Frog' through the garden to pick up all the flowers before the other animals beat you to it.

Frank the Frog can catch the animals with his long tongue. You will need to catch the animals before they get all the flowers.

Each level is completed when there are neither flowers nor animals left. You work to complete the level before you run out of time or energy. Receive more energy by collecting flowers instead of shooting them. The game goes faster over time and as you pass each level. Test your skills against more animals appearing at speed.

Voice commands:
- Alexa, open Garden Party
- go up
- go down
- go left
- go right
- Fire!
- Restart!

Want to go faster? Stack your command sequences to speed up the game. Some examples:

- 'Fire, Fire, Fire'
- 'Three times Fire'
- 'Two times right, turn up, Fire'
- 'Six times Forward, turn Left, Forward'


'Garden Party' is a contribution to the 'Amazon Alexa Hackathon at VOICE 2020'
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
